name: Quarantined Love
description:
Can you take on the challenge of surviving the pandemic knowing that your partner is on the other side of the world? Balance your needs and make sure your mental health does not deteriorate. Take care of your relationship, but don't forget to also take care of yourself. Balance is key to surviving this world-wide crisis and reuniting with your loved one.

The game is an early prototype right now, so the variety of content included is extremely limited. 

Contributions:

Shout out to mcsqure for providing icons for the radial menus ;)

Stay strong everyone! #LoveIsNotTourism
